document.full_text: swatch group, the world's largest watchmaker, will struggle to meet its 2011 sales guidance of 7 billion swiss francs ($8.23 billion) if the franc remains at such high levels, chief executive nick hayek said.
document.title: swatch group may struggle to hit 2011 sales guidance
lines_and_colors: swatch group, the world's largest watchmaker, will struggle to meet its 2011 sales guidance of 7 billion swiss francs ($8.23 billion) if the franc remains at such high levels, chief executive nick hayek said.
